languages.text: "Теперь ты ведаешь ее сагу до конца. Храни ее и неси другим, не дай подвигам былым в забвенье пасть, сестра".
"Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."
languages.original_text: "Теперь ты ведаешь ее сагу до конца. Храни ее и неси другим, не дай подвигам былым в забвенье пасть, сестра".

traits.locale_text: "Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."
"Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."
"Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."
"Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."

languages.text: “如今，你已经知道她史诗的始末了。牢记它，传唱给其他人，不要让过去的英勇事迹被人遗忘，修女。”
languages.original_text: "Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."

traits.locale_text: “如今，你已经知道她史诗的始末了。牢记它，传唱给其他人，不要让过去的英勇事迹被人遗忘，修女。”

languages.text: « Vous connaissez désormais toute son histoire. Préservez-la et partagez-la. Ne laissez pas les exploits du passé sombrer dans l'oubli, ma sœur. »
languages.original_text: "Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."

traits.locale_text: « Vous connaissez désormais toute son histoire. Préservez-la et partagez-la. Ne laissez pas les exploits du passé sombrer dans l'oubli, ma sœur. »

languages.text: «Ahora conoce el final de su saga. Consérvelo y compártalo, hermana. No deje que las grandes hazañas del pasado caigan en el olvido».
languages.original_text: "Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora conoce el final de su saga. Consérvelo y compártalo, hermana. No deje que las grandes hazañas del pasado caigan en el olvido».

languages.text: 「これで、お前は彼女のサーガを結末まで知ったというわけだ。過去の行いを忘却の彼方へ追いやってはならんぞ、シスター」
languages.original_text: "Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."

traits.locale_text: 「これで、お前は彼女のサーガを結末まで知ったというわけだ。過去の行いを忘却の彼方へ追いやってはならんぞ、シスター」

languages.text: "Nun kennt Ihr das Ende ihrer Saga. Bewahrt sie und teilt sie mit anderen. Lasst die Taten der Vergangenheit nicht in Vergessenheit geraten, Schwester."
languages.original_text: "Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."

traits.locale_text: "Nun kennt Ihr das Ende ihrer Saga. Bewahrt sie und teilt sie mit anderen. Lasst die Taten der Vergangenheit nicht in Vergessenheit geraten, Schwester."

languages.original_text: "Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."

languages.text: "Artık destanını sonuna kadar biliyorsun. Onu koruyup başkalarıyla paylaş. Geçmişte yapılanların hiç olup gitmesine müsaade etme Rahibe."
languages.original_text: "Now you know her saga to the end. Preserve it and share it with others — do not let the deeds of the past fall into oblivion, Sister."

traits.locale_text: "Artık destanını sonuna kadar biliyorsun. Onu koru ve diğerleriyle paylaş. Geçmişte yapılanların hiç olup gitmesine izin verme Rahibe."
